On the evening of June 12, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics graduation season
A student formed a huge travel code on the teaching building to commemorate his four years of university.

name: 李老师不是你老师

June 12, Changzhou, Jiangsu.
A school suddenly issued a notice to investigate the overseas relatives of students, the reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contributions
Under a video, netizens complained about the high housing prices in "India"
It is reported that since it is forbidden to discuss the current situation in China on TikTok, netizens began to use other countries to refer to China in the comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, in Guiping City, Guangxi, a man attacked a woman with a knife on the road and was then subdued by nearby residents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
June 13, Hong Kong. 
Graffiti with words such as "double standard" and "hegemony" was sprayed on the gate of the US Consulate General in Hong Kong and Macau. 
According to Hong Kong's Ta Kung Pao and Sing Tao Morning Post, the police later arrested a man at the scene on suspicion of "criminal damage" and took him back to the police station for investigation. His motive for the crime is still unclear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 13, Zhou Hongwei announced 360's "AI sensitive review system" at a press conference.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 13, the deans and professors of the various branches of the Central Academy of Fine Arts issued an open letter, jointly protesting against the school's vice president Lin Maoren's appointment as the new dean.
The article said that Lin Maoren was a "three-no" person with "no qualifications, no academic achievements, and no achievements", and that "teachers and students would not agree to his appointment as the new dean, history would not agree to it, and Chinese art would not agree to it."

name: 李老师不是你老师

Under a video about Xiongan New Area, netizens gave highly praised comments and messages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 12, Hu Xijin posted a message "Another couple caught!" and replaced the heads of the protagonists of the recent popular Chengdu street photography incident with Biden and Tsai Ing-wen.
Afterwards, the picture was blocked by Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Around 8pm on June 13, Neijiang, Sichuan.
Because the urban management beat up a vendor selling eggs, it caused public outrage, and a large number of people in the surrounding communities took to the streets to block the urban management vehicle and prevent it from leaving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequent updates: More and more people gathered at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subsequent supplement: At around 9 o'clock, the secretary of the Neijiang Municipal Party Committee and the director of the Public Security Bureau arrived at the scene
